question:
Consider the following statements about the Ethanol Blended Petrol (EBP) Programme:
  1. Under the programme, Oil Marketing Companies (OMC) are allowed to sell ethanol blended petrol with percentage of ethanol upto 10%
  2. The programme helps sugar mills in India to achieve better economic sense
  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
Under the Ethanol Blended Petrol (EBP) Programme, OMCs sell ethanol blended petrol with percentage of ethanol upto 10%. The programme was initially started to help sugar mills in India to achieve better economic sense. But later the Government has allowed procurement of ethanol produced from other non-food feed stocks, like cellulosic and ligno cellulosic materials including petrochemical route.
